item.description: I’ve worked and interacted with a lot of people working in engineering teams across various contexts, and one of the most common pain points I’ve encountered is the prolonged wait time for code reviews. Long delays in code reviews can cause several issues: Slower Delivery Pipeline üê¢ When reviews are delayed, the overall progress of the project is hindered, affecting delivery timelines. Idle Time and Context Switching ü¶• Developers either move on to new tasks or, worse, sit idle waiting for reviews.
